Actions.Name: Mighty Smite
Actions.Effects: Deals 2 damage again to attack target and the [name] gains 2 vigor if the foe is affected by a status. If that foe is affected by 3 or more statuses, increase damage and vigor gain to 5.

Actions.Name: Berserkgang
Actions.Description: A foe in range must save or gain hatred of the [name]. On a successful save, they are weakened. If the target or [name] is bloodied, they gain +1 curse on this save.

Actions.Name: Storm Cunning
Actions.Description: Swap places with an ally in range, removing and placing both characters. Bloodied characters gain 3 vigor.

Actions.Name: Joyous Combat
Actions.Effects: All adjacent foes must choose: be shoved 2, or take 4 damage from the [name].
